ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep yep Bree, I agree.  Based on what I have heard about the stats on this new cleric armor, I ll go for Fear armor any day.  Plus, the excitement and hunting
ygData.messageBody:
Yep yep Bree, I agree. Based on what I have heard about the stats on this
new cleric armor, I'll go for Fear armor any day. Plus, the excitement and
hunting in Fear is a heck of a lot more fun for me than sitting and camping
waiting for a spawn and running endlessly all over the dang game.

Mik
----- Original Message -----
From: Heather Daley <blushn@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 12:15 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Armor


> From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
> I prefer the excitement of fear to running around aimlessly anyday.
>
> I went to fear for the first time this past weekend, and even though I
died
> 7 times in 2 days, I had a blast. I even got boots out of the
deal.(granted
> efreeti boots are better, but I was wearing charred, so they are better
than
> what I had) The game has gotten kind of boring as of late and the plane
of
> fear adds a new and exciting twist to my playtime, I can't wait to go back
> this weekend again.(no wonder I am still level 47, hehe)
>
> I guess from my standpoint I can either, try and complete these quests
which
> gets me no experience at all, with no idea of what I will recieve OR I can
> get XP in Lguk or SolB all week long, so I have a nice buffer for going to
> fear on the weekends and potential for getting armor that I already know
is
> Whoop daddy.
>
> Just my thoughts once again,
>
> Bree Wyndsdale
>
>
